author: IQApps

changelog.release_notes:
Danish DMI decided to prevent reading weather through their API as JSON.

Openweathermap is now the source for weather info in this watchface.
Added option to mark current day with inverted colors or with a circle. Use setup to set the current day inverted.

Better digital clock digit positioning.
Better settingspage that remember your settings.
Icon, for this watchface, added to Pebble watchfaces menu.

Added settings page with several options.
Changed wind direction to letters like N,NØ,Ø,SØ,S,SV,V,NV.
Added % to humidity
Added function to enhance the light-on by tap or shake to 6 seconds instead of the default 3 seconds.

Fixed race condition issues when fetching data from Internet
Added Danish texts on watchface for errors when fetching data.

Fixed bluetooth symbol artifacts.
Fixed Calendar where only Sunday in current week was shifted to top line in calendar.

description:
Check regularly for new versions.

Use the "Version Information" menu below to see what has improved.

How to update to newest version: Uninstall the watchface and install it again. (Unload is not enough. This is on Pebble, I cannot push updates to you, sorry.)

This watchface is called "Just 4 Nicolai" because my son Nicolai had some special requirements.

The clock can be shown in digital or analog mode. This is configurable.

If you live in Denmark you may find this interesting.

The watchface get the weather information from DMI and show the info in Danish text. This is much more accurate than any other international weather service available.

You will also get a 3 week calender view, a battery state indicator and a charging indicator.

I have included a bluetooth disconnect alarm with a single vibrate and a 20 sec. flashing symbol. This alarm can be disabled,

Shaking your arm to turn on light, keeps the backlight on for some extra seconds, instead of the default 3 seconds. This is configurable.

Please use the contact developer option, if you have ideas or problems.

Enjoy...
